title: Build a Responsive Navigation
description:
Create a navigation bar that adapts to different screen sizes using media queries.

## Requirements

1. Style the `.navbar`:
   - Use flexbox layout
   - Column direction on mobile (default)
   - 16px padding
   - #333 background color

2. Style the `.nav-links` (ul):
   - Flexbox with column direction on mobile
   - 16px gap
   - No list style, margin, or padding

3. Add a media query at 768px:
   - Change navbar to row direction with space-between
   - Change nav-links to row direction

## Expected Result

Vertical stacked navigation on mobile, horizontal on tablet and larger.

testCases.description: Nav links list should use flexbox
Nav links should have no list style

hints: Use display: flex on both .navbar and .nav-links
Use flex-direction: column for mobile styles
Inside the media query, change flex-direction to row
Use justify-content: space-between on navbar in the media query
